channel.title: My 1st complete model with blender - Pistol Glock
channel.description:
It took me about 2 days and it's my 1st model i've finished with blender. please don't leave bad comments thank you. This is a Glock i've made by following a tutorial from thelolipopman93 ‎on youtube
here's some results.. :). [IMG]http://i630.photobucket.com/albums/uu25/agspwnage/wire.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i630.photobucket.com/albums/uu25/agspwnage/finalGlock4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i630.photobucket.com/albums/uu25/agspwnage/finalGlock3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i630.photobucket.com/albums/uu25/agspwnage/finalGlock2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i630.photobucket.com/albums/uu25/agspwnage/finalGlock1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i630.photobucket.com/albums/uu25/agspwnage/Proof.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i630.photobucket.com/albums/uu25/agspwnage/proof2.png[/img]
small animation i did. still need to fix those black spots :D. to lazy to animate the bottom part of the barrel when it disappears when it moves :p. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/24m93q9.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/fxwg84.jpg[/img]
Fixed the black spots there's still some small black lines i need to fix. :) [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/16i5xt0.jpg[/img]

item.title: My 1st complete model with blender - Pistol Glock
item.dc:creator: @zackasmacka zackasmacka
item.description:
@zackasmacka wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:13, topic:372861”]I believe you made this. Just own up as to whether you used a tut or not. And if you lie… I shall loose all respect for you. Nothing worse than someone who lies in my books.[/quote]I used a Tutorial from youtube, 15 parts. he’s youtube account thelolipopman93 look in hes vid and you can see it, i followed that tut step by step part by part and as you can see it came out the same but mine’s a lil bit messed up still needs to fix some stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: My 1st complete model with blender - Pistol Glock
item.dc:creator: @zackasmacka zackasmacka
item.description:
@zackasmacka wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:11, topic:372861”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=468887.msg3428146#msg3428146 date=1292110179]
The first image is a wire frame…and he followed a youtube tutorial to do this.
[/quote]
Naw. Either that or he used like 20-gons lawl. Ah he did? Nice I guess…

[quote author=zackasmacka link=topic=468887.msg3428157#msg3428157 date=1292110521]

[quote author=the wanderer link=topic=468887.msg3428143#msg3428143 date=1292109897]

Try using some sort of texture on the grip of it. Other than that, very nice for a first.
[/quote] I’m trying to find some textures thnx for the comment.

Make your own.
Almost too good to be true. Also show me a wireframe. And no that first one is not a wireframe. Look at the trigger guard.
[/quote]want more proof? look at the last pic i just put.

A picture with some text don’t prove much. Neither does a wireframe. You can’t really prove it unless you make a video, but something this generic you could just copy someone else video. I mean the wireframe does prove to a certain point as to it is indeed yours. Say if I found a download of a glock, I could compare wireframes and see if they are identical, or close to it. Anyways, nice.[/quote]I’ll make a vid…

Read full topic
item.source: My 1st complete model with blender - Pistol Glock

item.title: My 1st complete model with blender - Pistol Glock
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

The first image is a wire frame…and he followed a youtube tutorial to do this.

Naw. Either that or he used like 20-gons lawl. Ah he did? Nice I guess…

[quote=“zackasmacka, post:10, topic:372861”][quote author=the wanderer link=topic=468887.msg3428143#msg3428143 date=1292109897]

[quote author=zackasmacka link=topic=468887.msg3428116#msg3428116 date=1292108438]

Try using some sort of texture on the grip of it. Other than that, very nice for a first.
[/quote] I’m trying to find some textures thnx for the comment.

Make your own.
Almost too good to be true. Also show me a wireframe. And no that first one is not a wireframe. Look at the trigger guard.
[/quote]want more proof? look at the last pic i just put.[/quote]
A picture with some text don’t prove much. Neither does a wireframe. You can’t really prove it unless you make a video, but something this generic you could just copy someone else video. I mean the wireframe does prove to a certain point as to it is indeed yours. Say if I found a download of a glock, I could compare wireframes and see if they are identical, or close to it. Anyways, nice.

Read full topic
